content: all stitches picking up at least one stitch at thumb gusset to help close gap knit 1 5 thumb decreases row 1 * k2tog k1 * repeat to last 2 stitches k2tog row 2 + 3 knit row 4 * k2tog k1 * repeat to end row 5 + 6 knit row 7 k2tog* repeat to end 5 stitches thread tail of yarn through stitches on needles remove needle and pull tight weaving in end to close watch face opening if desired opening for watch face can be firmed up or made smaller to firm up edge pick up and knit stitches around opening and bind off as you go by passing the previous stitch over the new one creating a single chain to reduce using 4 needles pick up and knit around opening using one needle per side k2p2 rib one or two rounds decreasing on each end of the needle before binding off happy knitting
